transcripts.transcript_text: Speaker A: Call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying.
Speaker A: Your call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is.

Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Yeah, hello, am I speaking with Caleb here?
Speaker A: Yeah, Caleb.
Speaker B: Brush up this side. Calling you from Amber student.
Speaker A: Okay, yeah.
Speaker B: Caleb, just wanted to confirm if you have decided with the options now regarding your student accommodation.
Speaker A: Somewhat. I'm in a bit of a tricky situation. Basically, I have applied for two master's courses and essentially depending on the feedback of both on them is what will determine whether I actually follow through or not. I just kind of wanted to know a bit about what the policy is around that.
Speaker B: So there is a policy that if your place gets rejected at the university, we'll be able to provide you the refund. And along with that, if you are an international student and your visa gets rejected, we'll be able to provide you the refund.
Speaker A: Okay, cool. Okay, that sounds. That sounds good. So then, yeah, I think probably in the next three or four days I'll probably be securing a place, but yeah, we'll see.
Speaker B: Okay, thank you.
Speaker A: Thank you very much.
Speaker A: Your call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying.

Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Yeah, hello, I'm expecting a Caleb here.
Speaker B: Yeah, hello.
Speaker A: Caleb, this side. Calling you from Amber student and we are the official student accommodation partner for University College. So I can see that you're looking to book a student accommodation at I.Q. city. Correct?
Speaker B: Yeah.
Speaker A: So just wanted to confirm here you have shortlisted the rules. I brought the unsafe flat for 403 pounds, correct?
Speaker B: Yeah, I believe so, yeah.
Speaker A: Yeah. So just wanted to confirm if we can proceed ahead with the booking now because we haven't blocked the room yet. You need to make the deposit, get paid and also you need to choose whether you need to pay up front or installment for the rent payment.
Speaker B: I see. Yeah, I'm looking for. I'm actually looking around currently for basically I'm doing the room thing now, but I'm looking for like, I'm looking at my options, like what's nearest and stuff like that. So probably end of this, end of the, like tonight I will be like finalizing my payment and stuff.
Speaker A: So currently you're exploring the options, not finalizing it.
Speaker B: Correct, yeah.
Speaker A: So I'll do one thing here. I'll drop you a WhatsApp text. Okay. So if you have any queries regarding any of the accommodations, just let me know and then. And if you able to finalize any of the property, just let me know so that I can get that book for you.
Speaker B: Okay? Okay, cool. Lovely. Thank you so much. Thank you.
Speaker A: You're welcome. Have a great day.
Speaker A: Call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available. At the tone, please.
Speaker A: Your call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you.
Speaker A: Call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available. At the tone, please record your message. When you have finished recording, you may hang up.
Speaker A: Has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available. At the tone, please record your message. When you have finished.

Speaker B: Hello.
Speaker A: Yeah, hello, am I speaking with Caleb here? Yeah, hello Caleb, Rishabh this side calling you from ambitious student.
Speaker B: Hello.
Speaker A: Yeah, hi Caleb. Caleb. Just wanted to confirm if you have decided with the options now?
Speaker B: Yeah, I've booked the room already so I won't be needing to do this anymore.
Speaker A: And which property have you booked by the way?
Speaker B: It was out somewhere else.
Speaker A: Okay. Thank you so much for the confirmation.
Speaker B: Yeah, no worries. No worries. Thank you for your help. Cool. Is there anything else you want?
Speaker A: No, thank you so much.
Speaker B: Okay, cool. Thank you. Bye. Bye.
